body.value:
{
	"Subject": "CRH: Dataset Refresh Status",
	"Title": "PBI DATASETS REFRESH PIPELINE RUN FAILED",
	"Message": "@{replace(
						string(activity('act_lookup_select_exceptions').output.value)
				,'"','')
                              }",
	"EmailTo": "@{activity('act_lookup_EmailList').output.value[0].EmailTo}",
	"Color": "Red",
	"DataFactoryName": "@{pipeline().DataFactory}",
	"PipelineName": "@{pipeline().parameters.PipelineName}",
	"PipelineRunId": "@{pipeline().parameters.PipelineRunId}",
	"UTCTime": "@{formatDateTime(utcnow(), 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss')}"
}

sqlReaderQuery.value:
select p.[pipeline_name_nk] as [pipeline_name],
	lex.run_id,
	e.[dataset_name],
	lex.message
	from [dbo].[pipeline_log] lex
	left join [dbo].[pipeline] p on p.[pipeline_id] = lex.[pipeline_id]
	left join dbo.exception ex on ex.run_id = lex.run_id
	left join [dbo].[pbi_dataset] e on e.[pbi_dataset_id] = ex.[pbi_dataset_id]
	where lex.[parent_run_id] = '@{pipeline().parameters.parent_run_id}'
order by [error_timestamp]
